description: This video will discuss how to set up and use the Postgres FDW with a 32-way sharded PostgreSQL database and go over pros, cons, and limitations. We will talk about how you can use the Postgres FDW to bring all those shards back together- where it works and where it doesn't, and discuss the possible future for the Postgres FDW and how it might be changed to work better.
title: Stephen Frost: Using Postgres FDW with a sharded PostgreSQL Database
